## Q2

LA parking exercises:

Some more dplyr practice:

- How many tickets are in this data set?

- Create a plot of the weekly pattern (tickets issued per day of the week) 

- When are you most likely to get a ticket and when are you least likely to get a ticket?

- Which precinct issued the most tickets to Toyotas?

- How many different colors of cars were ticketed?

- Which color attracts most tickets?
